inscription:
Signature, Date, Title and Inscription

LLC, in the print: [Imp. Leroy.]; LRC, in the print: [Gazette des Beaux Arts]
provenance: [Judith L. Pillsbury, Paris, until 1985; gift in December, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1985-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC, in the print: [Edgar Chahine / 1900]; bottom center, in the print: [ALFRED STEVENS]
title: Portrait of Alfred Stevens
